problem_text_cn: 如图,在正方形ABCD中,G为CD的中点,连结AG并延长,交BC边的延长线于点E,对角线BD交AG于点F,已知AF=2,则线段AE的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the square ABCD, G is the midpoint of CD, connects AG and extends it, and the extended line line of the cross BC edge is at point E, and the diagonal BD crosses AG at point F. It is known that AF = N_0, then the length of the line segment AE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD为正方形,∴AB=CD,AB∥CD,∴∠ABF=∠GDF,∠BAF=∠DGF,∴△ABF∽△GDF,∴\frac{AF}{FG}=\frac{AB}{DG}=2,∴FG=\frac{1}{2}AF=1,∴AG=3．∵CG∥AB,AB=2CG,∴CG为△EAB的中位线,∴AE=2AG=6．故选:B．
